bill_title: to increase the penalty for purchase, possession, or consumption of tobacco by a minor.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to increase the penalty for purchase, possession, or consumption of tobacco by a minor. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 26-10-23 be amended to read as follows: 26-10-23. It is a petty offense Class 1 misdemeanor for any person under the age of eighteen to purchase, attempt to purchase, possess , or consume tobacco, cigarettes , or cigars unless it is done in the immediate presence of a the minor's parent, guardian , or spouse over the age of eighteen of such minor , or to misrepresent his or her age for the purpose of purchasing such tobacco, cigarettes , or cigars from any person. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
